required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of Hemodialysis on Cutaneo-muscular Electrical Impedance
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Hemodialysis on Cutaneo-muscular Electrical Impedance

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of this pilot study aims to describe the modifications of subcutaneous impedancemetry induced by dialysis.
As secondary objectives, the study aims to 1) describe the modifications of cutaneo-muscular impedancemetry induced by dialysis. 2) describe the relationship between modifications of subcutaneous impedancemetry induced by dialysis and - technical conditions of dialysis; - volemic parameters of dialysis; - evolution of liquid compartments in organism during dialysis; - volemic events or neuromuscular events. 3) describe the relationship between modifications of cutaneo-muscular impedancemetry induced by dialysis and 1) describe the modifications of cutaneo-muscular impedance induced by dialysis. 2) describe the relationship between modifications of subcutaneous impedancemetry induced by dialysis and - technical conditions of dialysis; - volemic parameters of dialysis; - evolution of liquid compartments in organism during dialysis; - volemic events or neuromuscular events.

detailed_description.textblock: The study will be realized in dialysis facility of Ambroise Paré hospital, APHP. The duration of enrollment of subjects will be 3 months, each enrolled patient will has 2 or 3 week's follow-up.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study, up to 4 months
primary_outcome.description: Electrical parameter extracellular resistance (Re) will be assessed.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study, up to 4 months
secondary_outcome.description: Cutaneo-muscular impedancemetry will be assessed by extracellular resistance (Re).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study, up to 4 months
secondary_outcome.description: Whole body impedancemetry will be assessed by Re.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of volemic or neuromuscular events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of study, up to 4 months
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of volemic or neuromuscular events during the session, such as: peridialytic hypotension, crampses.

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients suffering chronic renal failure and undergoing chronic hemodialysis in Ambroise Paré hospital.

overall_official.affiliation: Service de Néphrologie, Hôpital Ambroise Paré, APHP

facility.name: Service de Néphrologie, Hôpital Ambroise Paré, APHP
